author: James Freeman
title: The Speech
text:
Minority Leader Nancy Pelosi spoke for eight hours on the floor of the U.S. House on Wednesday. The California Democrat was demanding that Republicans agree to allow illegal aliens brought here as children to remain in the United States. As of this writing she is still refusing to support funding of the federal government until the immigration issue is resolved. According to Politico, Ms. Pelosi has succeeded in annoying a number of her Democratic colleagues.
It seems that some members of her caucus, including Rep. Luis Gutiérrez... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
